candidate: Iterative development is a development strategy in which the time is set aside to revise/rework and improve parts of the system.
references: Iterative development is a strategy in which time is set aside to revise and improve components of the system.
Iterative development is a strategy where we need to revise and improve parts of the system during the development.
Iterative development is a strategy where parts of the system is improved by a dedicated time.
iterative development is a strategy in software development where people spend time to make improvements to the system.
